actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend part A of title IV of the Social Security Act to provide additional fiscal relief for States and political subdivisions with respect to the costs of certain welfare programs.

summary.text: Amends Title IV, part A (Aid to Families with Dependent Children) of the Social Security Act to extend the period in which States will receive additional Federal financial assistance for programs under such Title. Increases to 50,000,000 the ceiling on total funds allocable among the States beginning in the first quarter after September 30, 1978.

titles.title: A bill to amend part A of title IV of the Social Security Act to provide additional fiscal relief for States and political subdivisions with respect to the costs of certain welfare programs.
